BoardImage

{% raw %}

class BoardImage[source]

BoardImage(path)

Represents a perfectly cropped image of a chessboard Attributes: path: url of image image: loaded PIL image from path

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} input: screenshot of board output: 64 images of each square, labeled with piece name input: image with label io: save image to proper directory {% raw %}

get_coord[source]

get_coord(name)

name: 2 character coordinate of board square. A8, h3, f4, etc
